name: Mouthful
description:
Play this amazing doodle drawn puzzle with limited options as you only have one inventory space. Bounce on springs, throw keys and squish ennemies with heavy weights to reach the door. Can you make it to the end? Can you do it without getting mauled by Escobrat's and Mr.Motton?

Please post a screenshot of your best time before the end of the voting period for a chance to win a free pizza of your choice! 

Made in 48h for the GMTK Gamejam 2019.
